Carnet de santé 2018[https://solidarites-sante.gouv.fr/IMG/pdf/carnet_de_sante-num-.pdf Carnet de santé in its latest update (2018)] Personal and family history, allergies Neonatal data: prenatal monitoring, delivery, term, adaptation to extra-uterine life, maternity monitoring, feeding, weight gain, stool colouring, etc. Follow-up data with summary of examination and conclusions (follow-up consultations, acute conditions) Growth: weight, height, CP, BMI curves, growth rate Oral health Hospitalisation, irradiating examinations, blood products Vaccinations (CERFA) and infectious diseases Throughout the booklet: advice on childcare, nutrition, parenting, etc.

question.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in the components of a child's health record as outlined in the Carnet de santé 2018?
question.option_a: Personal and family history, including allergies
question.option_b: Growth metrics such as weight, height, and BMI curves
question.option_c: Detailed records of all school grades and academic performance
